Params: {2: 'Nun', 3: 'And with so many supplies, as well.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nun', 3: "Hmph, nobody's gonna take your stuff even if you speak.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nun', 3: "I don't know where you managed to find all this, but you better keep a close look on them this time, got it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Luna... When I become a Construct... We can go live in Babylonia for a new life...'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Mhm, there'll be food, drinks, toys... fluffy beds and... hot showers..."}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "But why won't you let me become a Construct as well?"}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Because... That man said, Construct technology isn't mature, there might be... risks..."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Remember our promise? I'll handle the risky parts..."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "And, I'm already used to fighting with the Corrupted... but you're still not good with weapons..."}
{3: 'Lucia hugs Luna close and falls asleep as well, bearing a relieved smile in this bitterly cold room...'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'Luna? She went with those people in black early in the morning...'}
